about_the_game:
About

Twisted Jam is a game that blends ultimate frisbee and roller derby. It is a fast-paced, arcade-style game set in a digital world. Twisted Jam combines elements from many sport games while adding arcade-style twist.

Place yourself inside the Colosseum, where contenders team up to battle for the top spot. While competing, communicate with your squad to make plays on the opponent's goal. Additionally, take advantage of height by using "Flux Drift" to move around walls and ceilings. Don't forget to eliminate opponents; otherwise, they might do the same to you.

Mechanics

Hyper Throwing System: Contains many variations on throwing the disk. If there is an obstacle in your way, throw around it!

Flux Movement: Your character moves around on skates / hover shoes. Moving around may be feel like you walking on ice. Additionally, you can walk on certain walls (flux walls and fields).

Deflection System: It might look like a yoyo. Use this to protect your goal. Don't allow your opponent to score points on you.

Scrap Collision: Your opponent has the disk? Run into them. What if they don't have the disk? Still run into them.

content_descriptors.notes: Mature content includes destruction of character models by collision of object and other characters.
